spell.soulstone.warrior/bulwark.name: Bulwark
spell.soulstone.warrior/bulwark.descript: You gain a shield that is immune to attacks 3 times.
Grants a shield to nearby allies.
spell.soulstone.warrior/rallying_cry.des: Muster a shout with restorative power to heal your wounds.
spell.soulstone.warrior/unyielding_count: Knocks back and damages enemies in an area.
spell.soulstone.pastor/echo_of_fate.name: Echo of Fate
spell.soulstone.pastor/echo_of_fate.desc: Restores health to all units in the area.
spell.soulstone.pastor/temporal_shell.de: Conjures a shield of Holy Light in front of the target ally, warding off attacks.
spell.soulstone.pastor/holy_surge.name: Holy Surge
spell.soulstone.pastor/holy_surge.descri: Heal wounded allies with Holy Light.
spell.soulstone.pastor/sacred_radiance.d: Grant a powerful buff to nearby allies.
spell.soulstone.mage/elemental_amplifica: Harness the elements to apply a Strength effect to yourself.
spell.soulstone.mage/elemental_beam.name: Elemental Beam
spell.soulstone.mage/elemental_beam.desc: Harness the elements to condense a beam of light.
spell.soulstone.mage/elemental_galaxy.de: Conjure stars from the starry sea using the elements to attack your enemy.
spell.soulstone.mage/elemental_missile.d: Channel the elements to unleash a shot against the enemy.
spell.soulstone.con_artist/shadow_blessi: Harness the shadows to shelter yourself.
spell.soulstone.con_artist/shadow_empowe: Harness the shadows to empower yourself.
spell.soulstone.con_artist/shadow_stun.d: Applies a stun effect to the target.
spell.soulstone.zephyr_s_blessing.name: Zephyr's Blessing
spell.soulstone.zephyr_s_blessing.descri: Oops, forgot to write that part! :p
